free_resp_prompt: In the text box below, please describe any strategies you used to try and beat your opponent.
free_resp_answer: I tried to predict the computer's moves. So I had tried seeing a pattern in their way of playing and would try to guess until I found the pattern. I would continue to exploit that pattern until I saw the pattern changed and would spend time again looking for the computer's pattern and when I did I exploited it again.
